title: Gerber: Warner Winner Will Define Hollywood's Future
description: Ross Gerber, Gerber Kawasaki Wealth and Investment Management cofounder, president and CEO, says Paramount Skydance lacks significant firepower in Hollywood. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that acquiring Warner Bros. Discovery would make it the biggest player in Hollywood. (Source: Bloomberg)
